alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 25 at 9:54PM EDT until June 27 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County. .Heavy rainfall across Upstate, western North Carolina and the Midlands has produced rises on the area rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:58 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 116.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Monday morning. Minor fluctuations possible due to releases upstream. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
